item.title: Hey how can i change the train place?
item.dc:creator: @sjoukjeowns sjoukjeowns
item.description:
@sjoukjeowns wrote:

lol you can better make a new one?
first search the npc.id’s then open autospawn.cfg
ull see things like this

//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption
Spawn	=	494	3256	3418	0	0	0	0	0	Banker
Spawn	=	494	3254	3418	0	0	0	0	0	Banker
Spawn	=	494	3187	3446	0	0	0	0	0	Banker
Spawn	=	id	xxxx	yyyy	0	0	0	0	0	Banker

search your npc’s ids and change x and y coords
and make a command like ::train
or add new lines with id’s and coords do ::mypos in source to see pos or search in client.java ctrl+f for something like pos

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("train")&& playerRights >= 0){ 
teleportToX = xxxx;
teleportToY = yyyy;
sendMessage("Your text here");

}

0 for normal player to tele 3 admin depends on source
there is your train place:)
